notification.activate: Task activated Successfully. You cannot edit the task anymore.
notification.registerSuccess: User registered successfully, please proceed with login.
notification.rolesChangeReLogin: You need to login again because you changed your Role(s).

error.passwordPattern: Password should be at-least 8 characters long, must contain one lower case and one upper case letter, and one digit.
error.login: Unable to login. Please make sure the credentials are correct!
error.imageSignature: Failed to get signature for Image upload
error.uploadImage: Failed uploading file to cloud storage.
error.paymentRelease: Unable to release payment for the feedback
error.uploadSignedNDA: Please upload the signed NDA for requesting access to this Task.

note.askQuestions: Ask questions about your Prototype. This questionnaire will be presented to Crowd-Workers to get feedback for your Prototype.
note.activateTaskConfirmMessage: Please note that after activating the Task you can no longer edit or delete it. Please review all the data before activating it. The activated Task will be immediately available to the crowd-workers. Are you sure you want to activate the Task?
note.birthdayHint: Optional but Prototypes may have age requirement for evaluation.
note.countryHint: Optional but Prototypes may have matching country as a requirement for evaluation.
note.commentHint: Here you can provide any additional feedback (Optional)
note.crowdCriteria: Set the criteria for matching this Task with Crowd-Workers. Only the Crowd-Workers matching the specified criteria will be able to see this Task. Leave the optional fields empty if you don't want to filter by them.
note.closeIterationConfirmMessage: Please note that after closing the prototype iteration you can no longer receive feedback on this iteration. This iteration will no longer be visible to Crowdworkers to provide feedback. Are you sure you want to close the prototype iteration?
note.deleteTaskConfirmMessage: This action will delete only this Task iteration. The action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete the Task?
note.deleteProjectConfirmMessage: This action will delete the Project along with all Task iterations inside it. All your prototypes inside this Project will be deleted. This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to delete the Project?
note.deleteImageConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this Image?
note.deleteUserConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this User?
note.deleteFeedbackConfirmMessage: The feedback will no more be available to the Task owner. Are you sure you want to delete this Feedback?
note.experienceHint: Your total experience in the specified skills. Optional but Prototypes may have experience requirement for evaluation.
note.enterQuestion: Please enter your question and select the answer type.
note.iframeTask: The Prototype will be embedded as an iframe in the platform. You will need to provide a link for the prototype.
note.iframeTaskSubtitle: Link from a third party prototyping tool
note.imageTask: The Prototype will be uploaded in the form of images. The images correspond to different screens in your Application.
note.imageTaskSubtitle: Images of your Application's User Interface
note.openAccess: The prototype will be accessible to all crowd-workers.
note.ndaAccess: You will be required to upload the NDA which crowd-workers need to sign and upload. After that you will need to review the NDA and allow access to your Prototype
note.requestAccess: The crowd-workers will need to request access to your prototype. You can either accept or reject the request. Only after you accept their request, they can access your prototype.
note.rateFeedback: Please provide rating for the feedback. Additionally you can also give comments.
note.rateTask: Please provide rating for the Task. Additionally you can also give comments and mention about your experience with the Task owner.
note.prototype: Select the Prototype format and Test type.
note.prototypeLink: Please add a link for your prototype. Please not that it should be a link and not an embed code. If the Prototyping tool that you used provides an embed code for the Iframe, get the link out of that code and paste it here.
note.rolesHint: Developer role can create Prototypes. Crowdworker role can evaluate Prototypes. You can do both.
note.textDescription: Please provide textual description of your idea.
note.textTask: The Prototype will be added as Text. You can provide textual description of your Application idea.
note.taskAccess: Control access to your prototype by Crowd-Workers. This is the access control for your prototype, the crowd matching criteria specified above will still be respected for all the options given below. Please select one option.
note.basicTest: In a basic test, a single prototype is evaluated.
note.comparisonTest: In a comparison test, two prototypes of the same Application are evaluated with a comparison.
note.skillsHint: Your Professional skills. You can only evaluate Prototypes which match your skills.
note.giveFeedback: To give feedback on Prototypes, go to Evaluate from the side menu and open the Task you want to evaluate.
note.viewFeedbacks: To view your given feedbacks, go to Feedbacks from the side menu.
note.createPrototypes: To start creating your Prototypes, go to Projects from the side menu. Create a Project and start a new Task iteration in it.
note.basicImageUpload: Please upload images of your Prototype.
note.basicTextAdd: Please provide text for your Prototype.
note.basicIframeUpload: Please add link to your Prototype.
note.comparisonImageUpload1: Please upload images of your Prototype 1.
note.comparisonImageUpload2: Please upload images of your Prototype 2.
note.comparisonIframeUpload1: Please provide link for your Prototype 1.
note.comparisonIframeUpload2: Please provide link for your Prototype 2.
note.comparisonText1: Please provide textual description of your Prototype 1.
note.comparisonText2: Please provide textual description of your Prototype 2.
note.questionnaire: Add a Questionnaire to get feedback on your Prototype.
note.radioOptionsHint: Provide radio button options. Each entry in this field will be a radio button available as an option to be selected when answering this question. To create an option, enter text in this field and press enter button.
